hymn.title: For a Child is born to us
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | C/G - G7 - | C - - - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | C/G - G7 - | C - - - | C F/C C - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: For a Child is born to us; a Son is giv'n to us; and the gov -- ern -- ment is up -- on His shoul -- der. And His Name will be called: Won -- der -- ful Coun -- se -- lor, Migh -- ty God, E -- ter -- nal Fa -- ther, Prince of Peace. For a Peace. And His Name will be called: Won -- der -- ful Coun -- se -- lor. The gov -- ern -- ment is up -- on His shoul -- der For a Child is born, a Son is giv'n, I -- sai -- ah nine six.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2005 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: For a Child is born to us; a Son is giv'n to us; and the government is upon His shoulder. And His Name will be called: Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Eternal Father, Prince of Peace. (repeat)
And His Name will be called: Wonderful Counselor.
The government is upon His shoulder
For a Child is born, a Son is giv'n, Isaiah nine six.
